BR_text.BRsummary: Serialization turns bool array into uint8
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-code>>>> import ray, numpy as np
 >>> ray.init()
 >>> np.array([True], dtype=bool)
 array([ True], dtype=bool)
 >>> ray.get(ray.put(np.array([True], dtype=bool)))
 array([1], dtype=uint8)
 </denchmark-code>
